comments.author: Criswellious.9108
comments.body:
There’s a PR in the api-cdi repo for Achievement endpoints,
https://github.com/arenanet/api-cdi/pull/96

It’s marked as “ready”, but hasn’t been enabled yet (obviously, it’ll probably be enabled once the PR is merged).

comments.author: Fowidner.6930
comments.body:
HoT is coming and there will be new achievements to achieve. Will there be some Achievements tracker soon? And able to link it to some achievements app to see what you are missing, nearly compleeted, just compleeted and compleeted?

atm I have like no idea how much points I missed from old festivals/activities or the amount of (permanent) AP I still can get. There are some sheets which you can fill in yourself but that’s still a bit complicated and a little mistake is easily made with these sheets.
